name: Bestial Girls Explore
description:
I started this project with the goal of learning RPG maker and better understanding it as a tool. Though i didn't spend much time on menus so the interface is a bit rough, most of my time went into balancing the enemies their skills, the passive effects, the zones and the cost of the items.

This is a small game built around earning money and progression, you earn cash to get better items which lets you get through the game faster and faster, you won't be able to get through it on your first run but eventually you can reach the end and beat the final boss.

The controls are the standard rpg maker controls.

z or enter = action button

x or keypad 0 = cancel

left shift or right shift = run/speed up

Right now this is a windows only file, i can use the other explorters for mac and linux if more people show interest in it.

The plan was to draw everything myself which i thought might take around half a year but then the AI stuff came out, learned it and boosted my progression real fast and i was able to learn aspects or RPGmaker faster thanks to being able to produce faster characters, enemies and such, i still had to draw many things and fix all the issues but regardless it really helped speed things up.
